uiDesignItems.title: Persa-1
uiDesignItems.description: UI design for Persa, an Iranian crafts shop offering unique, handcrafted products. The design highlights the cultural heritage and artisanal quality.

uiDesignItems.title: Persa-2
uiDesignItems.description: A visually stunning UI for Persa, showcasing Iran's rich craftsmanship through an elegant and accessible shopping experience.

uiDesignItems.title: Persa-3
uiDesignItems.description: Persa's user interface design, focusing on simplicity and elegance, making it easy for customers to explore and purchase Iranian crafts.

uiDesignItems.title: Persa-4
uiDesignItems.description: A polished UI design for Persa, bringing Iranian craftsmanship to the digital world with a focus on user experience and aesthetic appeal.

uiDesignItems.title: Persa-5
uiDesignItems.description: User interface design for Persa, designed to showcase the beauty and uniqueness of Iranian crafts through an inviting and smooth interface.
